Знакомый делает платный курс по ML в Оксфорде. Пишите в личку или в каменты, если есть вопросы, постараюсь оперативно ответить.
Ценник будет чуть ниже для вас, при ссылке на меня (реферальной программы нет, не ищите))) реально курс знакомого). Проживание, еда внутри стоимости курса. Авиабилеты, виза - нет.

attachments.title: The Thalesians' Summer School in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
attachments.text: On 1-4 September, 2018, the Thalesians are preparing a unique Summer School in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML). Oxford and Imperial College academics and seasoned practitioners will go from the foundations of modern ML to current frontiers, including deep learning, backpropagation, recurrent neural networks, including Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM), perception-action cycles, and reinforcement learning. We will show how to use these methods and techniques to forecast financial time series and consider applications in finance and other areas. The programme commences on Level39 in Canary Wharf, Europe's and the world's most dynamic fintech hub. This will provide the delegates a unique networking opportunity in the heart of London's financial district. Following an introduction to data science and a refresher on Python Programming on Level39, Canary Wharf, the delegates will go to one of Oxford University's most beautiful colleges, Christ Church, to study the theory and practice of machine learning on real financial examples. We shall review: probability and statistics linear regression methods dimensionality reduction unsupervised machine learning bias-variance tradeoff model and feature selection classification neural nets and deep learning prediction from financial time series recurrent neural networks applications of neural networks in finance reinforcement learning frontiers of machine learning This is not only a unique opportunity to learn Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from industry experts, but excellent networking with industry leaders and Oxford's academics. The ticket includes accommodation in London and at Christ Church college and meals at the historic dining hall where Harry Potter (as well as Lewis Carroll, King Charles I, Daniel Dennett, Anthony Eden, Albert Einstein, William Ewart Gladstone, Robert Hooke, John Locke, Sir Robert Peel) used to dine! You can find more information in the brochure: <https://we.tl/mKrYqzdrWJ> Contact <mailto:marketing@thalesians.com|marketing@thalesians.com> for a more information, joining instructions, and details.
attachments.fallback: Eventbrite: The Thalesians' Summer School in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
